hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri that the Prophet (ﷺ) saw some spittle in the Qiblah of the Masjid. He scratched it off with a pebble and forbade a man to spit to his front or to his right. He said:"Let him spit to his left or beneath his left foot

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ نَهْىِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم عَنْ أَنْ يَبْصُقَ الرَّجُلُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ أَوْ عَنْ يَمِينِهِ وَهُوَ فِي صَلاَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet's Prohibition Of A Man Spitting To The Front Or To His Right When Praying
